caption.p: Visual decay of strawberries, bananas, and apples during storage time of 5 days. Each row shows the control on the left side, then the chitosan (CH)-, diethylaminoethyl chitosan derivative (DEAE-CH)-, and dodecyl grafted diethylaminoethyl chitosan derivative (DEAE-CH-DD)-coated antimicrobial edible films towards the right, respectively. The yellow arrows indicate signs of rot/spoilage. Reproduced with permission from [ 10]. Copyright 2020 Elsevier.
